title: The Figure in the Garage
description: When a beloved former firefighter is found dead in his garage, police are desperate for answers until they discover that a neighbor’s home security camera captured a figure near the crime scene. Was it the killer? Dennis Murphy reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
